pages.title: Queen Sophie Battle
pages.text: The minimum recommended gear i think you need is some fully enchanted netherite armor, gear and bow, A shield and a few Aljame Teacups and regular food and finally, a 48x48 square or round area should do, or you can just do it in the wild, but you might run the risk of it despawning her.
Queen Sophie don't move their arms or legs, because i don't know how to do custom model with animations, speaking of animations...

Queen Sophies should have a few summon, attack and equip animations because i also don't know how to do it. Aaaand about loot, it drops, 3-32 raw sophies, a Queen Sophie's Summoner Staff, her head, Relic and her crown.
